attributes.action: NMC Unfit to take care of Nurses
attributes.additional_details: The NMC is giving out false information at the Registration stage and has no viable input into our profession. Every telephone conversation is handle by a different person and every time the information changes. They are willing to take the money immediately but unwilling to assist later, We request the government to review their role and establish if THEY are fit for purpose

rejection.details: Please see 'Review the workings and viability of the Nursing and Midwife Council'
